mapper.insert: insert into prouser (us_id, us_pw, us_name, us_phone, us_email, us_address, us_crn, us_info, us_ok) values(#{us_id}, #{us_pw}, #{us_name}, #{us_phone}, #{us_email}, #{us_address}, #{us_crn}, 0, 0)
insert into prouser (us_id, us_pw, us_name, us_phone, us_email, us_address, us_crn, us_info, us_ok) values(#{us_id}, #{us_pw}, #{us_name}, #{us_phone}, #{us_email}, #{us_address}, #{us_crn}, 1, 0)
